parameters.name: BackendId
parameters.description: The ID of the backend service.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the current page.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: StageName
parameters.description:
The environment to which the API is published. Valid values:

*   **RELEASE**
*   **PRE**
*   **TEST**

If you do not specify this parameter, APIs in the draft state are returned.
